body_html: @ManuelaPa The developer website lists Win7 and Win10 versions for both CUDA9.0 and CUDA9.1. So one has to make sure to download and install the one needed - after removing previous versions on Windows (this is not the case on Linux). Can you please try this? This should work for you. If not, may I suggest you send a ticket or report a bug on the NVIDIA developer website?
